Trigger.name: Primary Prompt
Trigger.script:
if not snd.channeling then cecho(" <red>[<white>" .. snd.target .. "<red>]") snd.illusion_found = false
if not snd.firstaid then snd.send("firstaid on") end
if snd.offense_loaded then
if snd.last_hit_limb and snd.last_hit_limb~="none" then snd.last_struck_limb = snd.last_hit_limb end
local msg snd.battle_aff = "none" snd.chasten_aff = "none" snd.last_cured = "" snd.predatorVenom = nil snd.recent_affs = {}
snd.run_alerts()
if #snd.alertness >= 1 then dir = snd.parseDir(snd.alertnessDir) msg = "wt [" .. string.upper(snd.alertType) .. "] -" .. string.upper(dir) .. "- " for i in pairs(snd.alertness) do msg = msg .. snd.alertness[i] .. " " end snd.send(msg) end
snd.alertness = {} snd.alertnessDir = "none" end
snd.defended = false disableTrigger("Sunder Dodge") disableTrigger("Sunder Parry") disableTrigger("Sunder Rebounding") snd.core()
if snd.bashing_loaded or snd.toggles.fastwalk then
if snd.new.area then if gmcp.Room.Info.area == "the Shattered Vortex" then x, y = string.match(gmcp.Char.Status.level, "(.*) (.*)") level = tonumber(x) if level < 100 then area = "the Shattered Vortex (Low Level)" else area = "the Shattered Vortex (All)" --elseif snd.faction == "spirit" then --area = "the Shattered Vortex (Spirit)" --elseif snd.faction == "shadow" then -- area = "the Shattered Vortex (Shadow)" end if area ~= snd.my.area then cecho("\n<green>Entering: " .. area) snd.load_targets(area) send(" ") end else cecho("\n<green>Entering: " .. gmcp.Room.Info.area) snd.load_targets(gmcp.Room.Info.area) send(" ") end snd.new.area = false end if snd.new.room then snd.ylem_check = false end
if snd.new.room and (snd.toggles.fasthunt or snd.toggles.fastwalk) then if bot.going and (snd.pathing or (mmp.speedWalkCounter and mmp.speedWalkCounter or speedWalkCounter) ~= 0) then return end
if snd.toggles.fasthunt and snd.are_we_with_grouped() then snd.toggles.bashing = true snd.waiting.balance = false snd.room_clear = true snd.runBasher() snd.core() elseif bot.going then snd.move() end end end snd.new.room = false
else cecho("\n<cyan>SYSTEM IS PAUSED, SYSTEM IS PAUSED, USE <red>SNDON<cyan> TO UNPAUSE") if snd.firstaid then snd.send("firstaid off") end end
if snd.class == "Monk" then snd.stance = gmcp.Char.Vitals.stance end
if snd.class == "Predator" then snd.stance = gmcp.Char.Vitals.knife_stance end
snd.promptscript()
snd.staone()

Trigger.name: def start
Trigger.script: for i in pairs(snd.defenses) do snd.def_remove(i) end --snd.parrying = "none"

regexCodeList.string: You have the following active defences:

Trigger.name: defline gain
Trigger.script:
for i in pairs(snd.defenses) do if snd.defenses[i].defense == multimatches[2][2] then if snd.toggles.gags then deleteLine() end snd.def_gain(i) end end
if matches[2] == "blindness" and (snd.cureset == "akkari" or snd.cureset == "praenomen") then snd.firstaidchangecure = true send("firstaid priority defence blindness 3") end

Trigger.name: defline strip
Trigger.script: for i in pairs(snd.defenses) do if snd.defenses[i].defense == multimatches[2][2] then if snd.toggles.gags then deleteLine() end if multimatches[2][2] == "efficiency" then snd.efficiency = false snd.efficiencycount = "" end snd.def_take(i) end snd.def_needed = true end

regexCodeList.string: You kneel, and place your hands upon the earth beneath you. As if on command, the earth shifts and begins to travel up your arms.

The rise and fall of your chest mirrors the encroaching rhythm of brume's chill crawling across arm and leg and extremity. Blood freezes in place, its passage slowed by crystals of icy rime now coursing through your veins.

Trigger.name: Which endgame skills you got?
Trigger.script: local possible_skills = { "Selfishness", "Chameleon", "Irongrip", "Nightsight", "Stalking", "Heatsight", "Pacing", "Gripping" } for _, v in pairs(possible_skills) do if string.find(matches[2], v) and not table.isMember(snd.skills.raceskills, v) then if v == "Gripping" then if not table.isMember(snd.skills.raceskills, "Irongrip") then table.insert(snd.skills.raceskills,"Irongrip") end else table.insert(snd.skills.raceskills, v) end end end

local possible_skills = { "Firefly", "Moss", "Feather", "Shield", "Mindseye", "Hammer", "Cloak", "Bell", "Crystal", "Wand", "Moon", "Cloud", "Starburst", "Armour", "Boar", "Flower", "Web", "Tentacle", "Flame", "Hourglass", "Owl", "Brazier", "Prism", "Anchor", "Book", "Tree", "Mountain", "Chameleon", }
for _, v in pairs(possible_skills) do if string.find(matches[2], v) and not table.isMember(snd.skills.tattoos_on_me, v.."Tattoo") then table.insert(snd.skills.tattoos_on_me, v.."Tattoo") end end

Trigger.name: affline got
Trigger.script:
if snd.toggles.gags then deleteLine() end
snd.aff_gain(matches[2]) snd.aff(matches[2])
if table.isMember(snd.firstaidpredict, matches[2]) then send("FIRSTAID UNPREDICT "..matches[2]) delitem(snd.firstaidpredict, matches[2]) end
if matches[2] == "paresis" then if not snd.swaggered and snd.swagger <= 3 and (snd.class == "Zealot" or snd.class == "Ravager") then if snd.class == "Ravager" then snd.send("qeb contempt") end snd.swaggered = true tempTimer(5,[[snd.swaggered = false]]) elseif #snd.elevatedaff < 1 and not snd.elevatedaff["paresis"] then if not snd.class == "Carnifex" then send("firstaid elevate paresis") end end elseif matches[2] == "hypersomnia" then snd.metawakeon = true elseif #snd.elevatedaff < 1 then if matches[2] == "paralysis" and not snd.elevatedaff["paralysis"] then send("firstaid elevate paralysis") elseif matches[2] == "gloom" and (snd.cureset == "sciomancer" or snd.cureset == "runecarver") and not snd.elevatedaff["gloom"] then snd.firstaidchangecure = true expandAlias("kd blindness") send("firstaid elevate gloom"..snd.sep.."firstaid priority defence blindness 26") elseif matches[2] == "burnt_skin" and not snd.elevatedaff["burnt_skin"] then snd.firstaidchangecure = true send("firstaid elevate burnt_skin") elseif matches[2] == "blisters" and (snd.cureset == "carnifex" or snd.cureset == "warden") and not snd.elevatedaff["blisters"] then send("firstaid elevate blisters") elseif matches[2] == "slickness" and (snd.have_aff("anorexia") and snd.have_aff("asthma") and snd.have_aff("slickness")) and not snd.elevatedaff["slickness"] then send("firstaid elevate slickness") elseif matches[2] == "asthma" and (snd.cureset == "earthcaller" or snd.cureset == "luminary") and not snd.elevatedaff["hypochondria"] then send("firstaid elevate hypochondria") elseif matches[2] == "vertigo" and (snd.cureset == "bloodborn" or snd.cureset == "ascendril") and not snd.elevatedaff["vertigo"] then send("firstaid elevate vertigo") elseif matches[2] == "dizziness" and (snd.cureset == "bloodborn" or snd.cureset == "ascendril") and not snd.elevatedaff["dizziness"] then send("firstaid elevate dizziness") elseif matches[2] == "confusion" and (snd.cureset == "bloodborn" or snd.cureset == "ascendril") and not snd.elevatedaff["confusion"] then send("firstaid elevate confusion") elseif matches[2] == "withering" and (snd.cureset == "templar" or snd.cureset == "revenant") and not snd.elevatedaff["withering"] then send("firstaid elevate withering") elseif matches[2] == "clumsiness" and (snd.class == "Carnifex" or snd.class == "Executor") and not (snd.have_aff("paresis") or snd.have_aff("paralysis")) and not snd.elevatedaff["clumsiness"] then send("firstaid elevate clumsiness") elseif matches[2] == "justice" and snd.class == "Carnifex" and not snd.elevatedaff["justice"] then send("firstaid elevate justice") elseif matches[2] == "weariness" and snd.class == "Carnifex" and not snd.elevatedaff["weariness"] then send("firstaid elevate weariness") elseif matches[2] == "disfigurement" and (snd.class == "Indorani" or snd.class == "Executor" or snd.class == "Carnifex") and not snd.elevatedaff["disfigurement"] then send("firstaid elevate disfigurement") end end
if snd.have_aff("blackout") and snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp == gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp and gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp == gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp then send("firstaid predict recklessness") end elseif snd.have_aff("blackout") then enableTimer("blackout") elseif snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp == gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp and gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp == gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp then send("firstaid predict recklessness") end end

regexCodeList.string: ^You are afflicted with ([a-z_-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: Transformation...yay
Trigger.script:
snd.aff_gain(matches[3]) snd.aff_cure(matches[2])
if snd.elevatedaff["paresis"] then send("firstaid unelevate paresis") end
if snd.have_aff("paralysis") and not snd.elevatedaff["paralysis"] then send("firstaid elevate paralysis") end
if snd.have_aff("blackout") and snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") elseif snd.have_aff("blackout") then enableTimer("blackout") elseif snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") end

regexCodeList.string: ^Your ([a-z_-]+) has transformed into ([a-z_-]+)\.$

Trigger.name: affline cure
Trigger.script:
if snd.toggles.gags then deleteLine() end
local aff = multimatches[1][2] snd.elevatedaff[aff] = nil snd.aff_cure(aff)
if table.isMember(snd.firstaidpredict, aff) then send("FIRSTAID UNPREDICT "..aff) delitem(snd.firstaidpredict, aff) end
if snd.have_aff(aff) then else if snd.unknownquantity > 0 then snd.unknownquantity = snd.unknownquantity - 1 if snd.unknownquantity == 0 then if snd.have_aff("unknown") then snd.aff_cure("unknown") end end end end
if (aff == "left_arm_crippled" or aff == "right_arm_crippled") and snd.have_aff("a_crippled_arm") then snd.aff_remove("a_crippled_arm") end if (aff == "left_leg_crippled" or aff == "right_leg_crippled") and snd.have_aff("a_crippled_leg") then snd.aff_remove("a_crippled_leg") end
if aff == "blackout" or aff == "stupidity" or aff == "aeon" then snd.healretry = false send("recoup"..snd.sep.."concentrate") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end if snd.sync == true then snd.statusrecovery = true end snd.stunrecheck = false elseif aff == "confusion" then send("concentrate") elseif aff == "disfigurement" then snd.statusrecovery = true snd.setpassive = true snd.loyalsattacking = false elseif aff == "impatience" then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end elseif aff == "right_leg_crippled" or aff == "left_leg_crippled" then snd.send("stand") end
if aff == "gloom" and (snd.cureset == "sciomancer" or snd.cureset == "runecarver") then snd.firstaidchangecure = true send("firstaid priority defence blindness 8") expandAlias("kd blindness") elseif aff == "burnt_skin" then snd.firstaidchangecure = true elseif #snd.elevatedaff < 1 then if snd.have_aff("blisters") and (snd.cureset == "carnifex" or snd.cureset == "warden") and not snd.elevatedaff["blisters"] then send("firstaid elevate blisters") elseif aff == "clumsiness" then if snd.have_aff("slickness") and snd.class == "Carnifex" and not snd.elevatedaff["slickness"] then send("firstaid elevate slickness") elseif snd.have_aff("paresis") and not snd.elevatedaff["paresis"] then send("firstaid elevate paresis") elseif snd.have_aff("paralysis") and not snd.elevatedaff["paralysis"] then send("firstaid elevate paralysis") end elseif snd.have_aff("asthma") and (snd.cureset == "earthcaller" or snd.cureset == "luminary") and not snd.elevatedaff["asthma"] then send("firstaid elevate asthma") elseif snd.have_aff("vertigo") and (snd.cureset == "bloodborn" or snd.cureset == "ascendril") and not snd.elevatedaff["vertigo"] then send("firstaid elevate vertigo") elseif snd.have_aff("dizziness") and (snd.cureset == "bloodborn" or snd.cureset == "ascendril") and not snd.elevatedaff["dizziness"] then send("firstaid elevate dizziness") elseif snd.have_aff("confusion") and (snd.cureset == "bloodborn" or snd.cureset == "ascendril") and not snd.elevatedaff["confusion"] then send("firstaid elevate confusion") elseif snd.have_aff("clumsiness") and (snd.class == "Carnifex" or snd.class == "Executor") and not (snd.have_aff("paresis") or snd.have_aff("paralysis")) and not snd.elevatedaff["clumsiness"] then send("firstaid elevate clumsiness") elseif snd.have_aff("justice") and snd.class == "Carnifex" and not snd.elevatedaff["justice"] then send("firstaid elevate justice") elseif snd.have_aff("weariness") and snd.class == "Carnifex" and not snd.elevatedaff["weariness"] then send("firstaid elevate weariness") elseif snd.have_aff("withering") and (snd.cureset == "templar" or snd.cureset == "revenant") and not snd.elevatedaff["withering"] then send("firstaid elevate withering") elseif snd.have_aff("disfigurement") and (snd.class == "Indorani" or snd.class == "Executor" or snd.class == "Carnifex") and not snd.elevatedaff["disfigurement"] then send("firstaid elevate disfigurement") end end
if #snd.limbbrokencount > 0 then if aff == "left_leg_crippled" then delitem(snd.limbbrokencount, "left_leg_crippled") elseif aff == "right_leg_crippled" then delitem(snd.limbbrokencount, "right_leg_crippled") elseif aff == "right_arm_crippled" then delitem(snd.limbbrokencount, "right_arm_crippled") elseif aff == "left_arm_crippled" then delitem(snd.limbbrokencount, "left_arm_crippled") end end
if snd.have_aff("blackout") and snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") elseif snd.have_aff("blackout") then enableTimer("blackout") elseif snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") end

regexCodeList.string: ^You have cured ([a-z_-]+)\.$
FG14BG2

Trigger.name: arms
Trigger.script: snd.aff_have("a_crippled_arm")

regexCodeList.string: A serpentine blademistress spits onto her scimitar before slicing into you, and your arm wastes away beneath burning venom.
Blood floats up through the water as a blackened, ravenous shark seizes your arm in its maw, nearly tearing it from your body and snapping bones in the process.
The crone strokes your arm, withering it into uselessness.
^Before you can avoid it, \w+'s? hand brushes against your arm and it withers away\.$

Trigger.name: legs
Trigger.script: snd.aff_have("a_crippled_leg")

regexCodeList.string: A tattered Bahkatu experiment tears into your knee with his rabid maw, snapping the bone easily beneath such immense pressure.
A giant, rabid Syll seizes your leg in an iron grip, nearly pulling it clean from the socket.
A chimera's black lion head seizes your leg in its grip, wrenching it painfully from its socket as it tosses you to the ground.
A sharp-toothed gremlin's eyes gleam as it slams its head into your knee, shattering it and knocking you off-balance.
^(\w+) reaches out and grabs your leg, which almost gives way underneath you as it shrivels feebly away\.$
You stumble slightly as your left leg shrivels into a useless appendage.
You slowly hobble
You stumble slightly as your right leg shrivels into a useless appendage.

Trigger.name: affline have discovered
Trigger.script:
if snd.gui.enabled then deleteLine() end snd.aff_gain(matches[2])
snd.hidden_afflictions = math.max(0, snd.hidden_afflictions - 1)
if matches[2] == "paresis" then if not snd.queuesent and not snd.waiting.queue then send("queue clear") elseif not snd.swaggered and matches[2] == "paresis" then if snd.swagger <= 3 then if snd.class == "Ravager" then snd.send("qeb contempt") end snd.swaggered = true tempTimer(5,[[snd.swaggered = false]]) end end end
if snd.have_aff("blackout") and snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp == gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp and gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp == gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp then send("firstaid predict recklessness") end elseif snd.have_aff("blackout") then enableTimer("blackout") elseif snd.have_aff("recklessness") then enableTimer("recklessblackouttimer") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp == gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp and gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp == gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp then send("firstaid predict recklessness") end end

regexCodeList.string: You use Subjugation Endoskeleton.

A swarm of bone fragments bursts in a calamitous display, shards of bone splintering to plunge deeply into your flesh. Your skin bulges and contorts as the fragments of your swarm eat ruthlessly away at every piece of bone in your body, replacing them with newer, stronger pieces of your own formation. As the pain subsides and you rise anew, naught remains of your fragments.

Trigger.name: got limb damage
Trigger.script:
snd.my_limb_damage[multimatches[2][2]] = snd.my_limb_damage[multimatches[2][2]]+tonumber(multimatches[2][3])
snd.heelrush = "none"
local limb = multimatches[2][2] local damage = tonumber(multimatches[2][3])
if limb == "left leg" then snd.limblist.leftleg = snd.limblist.leftleg + damage elseif limb == "right leg" then snd.limblist.rightleg = snd.limblist.rightleg + damage elseif limb == "torso" then snd.limblist.torso = snd.limblist.torso + damage elseif limb == "head" then snd.limblist.head = snd.limblist.head + damage elseif limb == "left arm" then snd.limblist.leftarm = snd.limblist.leftarm + damage elseif limb == "right arm" then snd.limblist.rightarm = snd.limblist.rightarm + damage end
if (hasSkill("Fending") or hasSkill("Guarding") or hasSkill("Parrying") or hasSkill("Oppose")) then snd.parry() end
snd.masterprerestore()

Trigger.name: cured limb damage
Trigger.script:
snd.my_limb_damage[multimatches[2][2]] = snd.my_limb_damage[multimatches[2][2]]-tonumber(multimatches[2][3])
local limb = multimatches[2][2] local damage = tonumber(multimatches[2][3])
if limb == "left leg" then snd.limblist.leftleg = ((snd.limblist.leftleg) - damage) if snd.limblist.leftleg < 0 then snd.limblist.leftleg = 0 end elseif limb == "right leg" then snd.limblist.rightleg = ((snd.limblist.rightleg) - damage) elseif limb == "torso" then snd.limblist.torso = ((snd.limblist.torso) - damage) elseif limb == "head" then snd.limblist.head = ((snd.limblist.head) - damage) elseif limb == "left arm" then snd.limblist.leftarm = ((snd.limblist.leftarm) - damage) elseif limb == "right arm" then snd.limblist.rightarm = ((snd.limblist.rightarm) - damage) end
if (hasSkill("Fending") or hasSkill("Guarding") or hasSkill("Parrying") or hasSkill("Oppose")) then snd.parry() end
snd.masterprerestore()

regexCodeList.string: You take a moment to assess how damaged your limbs are:

Trigger.name: wounds line
Trigger.script:
snd.my_limb_damage[string.lower(matches[2])] = tonumber(matches[3])
local canparry = false
if (hasSkill("Fending") or hasSkill("Guarding") or hasSkill("Parrying") or hasSkill("Oppose")) then canparry = true end
if string.lower(matches[2]) == "head" then snd.limblist.head = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist.head) > 6 and canparry then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist.head) < 1 and snd.have_aff("pre_restore_head") then snd.aff_remove("pre_restore_head") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "torso" then snd.limblist.torso = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist.torso) > 6 and canparry then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist.torso) < 1 and snd.have_aff("pre_restore_torso") then snd.aff_remove("pre_restore_torso") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "left arm" then snd.limblist.leftarm = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist.leftarm) > 6 and canparry then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist.leftarm) < 1 and snd.have_aff("pre_restore_left_arm") then snd.aff_remove("pre_restore_left_arm") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "left leg" then snd.limblist.leftleg = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist.leftleg) > 6 and canparry then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist.leftleg) < 1 and snd.have_aff("pre_restore_left_leg") then snd.aff_remove("pre_restore_left_leg") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "right arm" then snd.limblist.rightarm = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist.rightarm) > 6 and canparry then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist.rightarm) < 1 and snd.have_aff("pre_restore_right_arm") then snd.aff_remove("pre_restore_right_arm") end elseif string.lower(matches[2]) == "right leg" then snd.limblist.rightleg = tonumber(matches[3]) if tonumber(snd.limblist.rightleg) > 6 and canparry then snd.parry() end if tonumber(snd.limblist.rightleg) < 1 and snd.have_aff("pre_restore_right_leg") then snd.aff_remove("pre_restore_right_leg") end end
snd.masterprerestore()

Trigger.name: bracket prompt blackout
Trigger.script:
if snd.not_aff("blackout") then snd.aff_gain("blackout") end snd.aff("blackout")
local healthchangeval = 0
if gmcp.Char.Vitals ~= nil then healthchangeval = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) - tonumber(snd.lasthealth)) if snd.not_aff("blackout") then if tonumber(healthchangeval) ~= "0" then if tonumber(snd.lasthealth) > tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) then cecho("<red>\[\- " ..healthchangeval.. " \-\]") elseif tonumber(snd.lasthealth) < tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) then cecho("<cyan>\[\+ " ..healthchangeval.. " +\]") end end end snd.percenthealth = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.hp) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxhp) * 100) snd.percenthealth = roundDown(snd.percenthealth,0) snd.percentmana = (tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.mp) / tonumber(gmcp.Char.Vitals.maxmp) * 100) snd.percentmana = roundDown(snd.percentmana,0) end
enableTimer("blackout")

Trigger.script:
local reset_check = false local triggertext = matches[1]
if triggertext:find("Underking") then local dead_rooms_check = {"109", "108", "110", "9278", "18524"} if table.contains(dead_rooms_check, tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num)) then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") end elseif triggertext:find("Void") then local dead_rooms_check = {"62630", "18523", "66313", "66312", "64992"} if table.contains(dead_rooms_check, tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num)) then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") end elseif triggertext:find("desolate mire") then local dead_rooms_check = {"60044", "59929"} if table.contains(dead_rooms_check, tostring(gmcp.Room.Info.num)) then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") end end
if triggertext:find("Substitute") then for a in pairs(snd.afflictions) do snd.aff_remove(a) end end -- -- if triggertext:find("Starburst") then -- reset_check = true -- end
if triggertext:find("Mirror") and gmcp.Room.Info.num == 1330 then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") elseif triggertext:find("Blackness") and gmcp.Room.Info.num == 31040 then reset_check = true expandAlias("sndoff") end
if reset_check then snd.reset_me()
snd.toggles.active = false
for i in pairs(snd.my_limb_damage) do snd.my_limb_damage[i] = 0 end
end
snd.class_hitting = "none" found_set = "none" snd.cureset = "none" snd.firstaidresetlistnone() snd.firstaidclassset = false snd.parrying = "none" enableTimer("Firstaidstatustimer") snd.efficiency = false snd.efficiencycount = ""
if snd.geotrace == true then snd.empowerready = true snd.empowertype = "nil" else snd.geotrace = false snd.geoinvert = false snd.empowerready = true snd.empowertype = "nil" end snd.toilon = false
if table.contains(gmcp.Char.Afflictions.Add, "dead") then cecho("\nThis is to confirm that GMCP shows you as dead.") end

Trigger.name: 200 heal
Trigger.script:
if snd.have_aff(matches[2]) then else if snd.unknownquantity > 0 then snd.unknownquantity = snd.unknownquantity - 1 if snd.unknownquantity == 0 then if snd.have_aff("unknown") then snd.aff_cure("unknown") end end end end
snd.aff_cure(matches[2])
if (matches[2] == "left_arm_crippled" or matches[2] == "right_arm_crippled" or matches[2] == "crippled left arm" or matches[2] == "crippled right arm") and snd.have_aff("a_crippled_arm") then snd.aff_remove("a_crippled_arm") end if (matches[2] == "left_leg_crippled" or matches[2] == "right_leg_crippled" or matches[2] == "crippled left leg" or matches[2] == "crippled right leg") and snd.have_aff("a_crippled_leg") then snd.aff_remove("a_crippled_leg") end
local multiaffliction = matches[2]
if multiaffliction == "blackout" then snd.healretry = false send("recoup"..snd.sep.."concentrate") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end if snd.sync == true then snd.statusrecovery = true end
elseif multiaffliction == "confusion" then send("concentrate") elseif multiaffliction == "disfigurement" then snd.statusrecovery = true snd.setpassive = true snd.loyalsattacking = false elseif multiaffliction == "impatience" then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end
elseif (multiaffliction == "stupidity" or multiaffliction == "aeon") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end if snd.sync == true then snd.statusrecovery = true end snd.stunrecheck = false send("concentrate"..snd.sep.."drink health")
elseif multiaffliction == "right_leg_crippled" or multiaffliction == "left_leg_crippled" then snd.send("stand") end
if matches[2] == "gloom" then send("firstaid priority gloom 20"..snd.sep.."firstaid priority defence blindness 8") expandAlias("kd blindness") end

tempTimer(1, function() raiseEvent("sunder_login") end)
if gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Azudim" or gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Chaos Lord" then snd.endgamedef = "miasma" snd.endgamehealth = "shift"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Tekal" then snd.endgamedef = "none" snd.endgamehealth = "none"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race == "Idreth" then snd.endgamedef = "safeguard" snd.endgamehealth = "pulse"
elseif gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Azudim" and gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Yeleni" and gmcp.Char.Status.race ~= "Idreth" then snd.endgamedef = "none" snd.endgamehealth = "none" end

Trigger.script: local blacklist = { A = true, a = true, masked = true, man = true, ["and"] = true, woman = true, person = true, shadowy = true, concealed = true, figure = true, } local do_we_update = false for name in string.gmatch(matches[2], '[^,%s]+') do if not blacklist[name] then if not table.isMember(snd.players_here, name) then table.insert(snd.players_here, name) do_we_update = true end end end if do_we_update then raiseEvent("sunder_people_update") end

Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.bashing.target then -- ^You can find no such target as \'(\d+)\'\.$ local tid = matches[2] -- ^You can find no such target as \'(\w+)\'\.$ for item in pairs(snd.items) do for id in pairs(snd.items[item]) do if snd.items[item][id] == tid then table.remove(snd.items[item], id) if #snd.items[item] == 0 then snd.items[item] = nil end break end end end for item in pairs(snd.agros) do for id in pairs(snd.agros[item]) do if snd.agros[item][id] == tid then table.remove(snd.agros[item], id) if #snd.agros[item] == 0 then snd.agros[item] = nil end break end end end if snd.toggles.bashing then snd.no_target() snd.runBasher() end end enableTimer("looktimer")

regexCodeList.string: A palpitating tremor resonates from the leylines as a lesser focal point is tapped for its energy.
A spicy, ashen smell wafts up your nose and you look up to notice a fire signal eddying up into the sky; an event within the ruins has been signalled.
A spicy, ashen smell wafts up your nose and you look up to notice a fire signal eddying up into the sky; an event within the ruins will begin within fifteen minutes.
The spicy, ashen smell that had been lingering begins to subside and you know the signal fire has been extinguished; there is five minutes before the event begins in the ruins.
A spicy, ashen smell touches your nose, the scent familiar to the incense used in the Ophidian Ruins, signalling an event within them has been signalled.
A spicy, ashen smell touches your nose, the scent familiar to the incense used in the Ophidian Ruins, signalling an event within them will begin within fifteen minutes.
A sudden rumbling seizes the continent of Sapience, shuddering briefly as the earth heaves against itself in a fitful tremor.
A raw, violet glow dances across the horizon, wreathing the stars in a murky haze high above.
Inelegant patterns of green light dance across the horizon in a show of brilliance before quickly fading away.
A pulse of twin tremors washes over you from the leylines, the conjoined foci quivering as one of them is tapped.

local xp = string.gsub(matches[4],",","") local xp = tonumber(xp)
if snd.gui.enabled then local mobs_to_level = (max_xp - xp) / last_xp local mobs_xp_percent = (tonumber(last_xp) / max_xp) * 100
snd.message("<red>Experience Gained<white>: " .. matches[2] .. " - from " .. matches[3] .. ". Total: " .. matches[4] .. ".") snd.message("<white>Remaining xp: "..(max_xp - xp).."<yellow> [<white>"..round(mobs_to_level,0).."<yellow>] mobs of this type to level!")
local x, y = string.match(gmcp.Char.Status.level, "(.*) (.*)") local level = tonumber(x) end

Trigger.name: Elevate - Firstaid
Trigger.script: snd.elevatedaff[matches[2]] = true

regexCodeList.string: ^You have elevated (.*) to be the maximum priority.$
^You have already elevated the (.*) affliction.$

Trigger.name: elevated not known by prediction or have
Trigger.script:
deleteFull() local aff = matches[2] if table.isMember(snd.firstaidpredict, aff) then delitem(snd.firstaidpredict, aff) end snd.aff_cure(aff) snd.elevatedaff[aff] = nil
if snd.have_aff(matches[2]) then snd.aff_cure(matches[2])
if (matches[2] == "left_arm_crippled" or matches[2] == "right_arm_crippled") and snd.have_aff("a_crippled_arm") then snd.aff_remove("a_crippled_arm") end if (matches[2] == "left_leg_crippled" or matches[2] == "right_leg_crippled") and snd.have_aff("a_crippled_leg") then snd.aff_remove("a_crippled_leg") end
end
local multiaffliction = matches[2]
if multiaffliction == "blackout" then snd.healretry = false send("recoup"..snd.sep.."concentrate") if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end if snd.sync == true then snd.statusrecovery = true end
elseif multiaffliction == "confusion" then send("concentrate") elseif multiaffliction == "disfigurement" then snd.statusrecovery = true snd.setpassive = true snd.loyalsattacking = false elseif multiaffliction == "impatience" then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end
elseif (multiaffliction == "stupidity" or multiaffliction == "aeon") then if gmcp.Char.Vitals.salve == "1" then snd.salvebal = true else snd.salvebal = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.focus == "1" then snd.focus = true else snd.focus = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.tree == "1" then snd.tree = true else snd.tree = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.moss == "1" then snd.moss = true else snd.moss = false end if gmcp.Char.Vitals.elixir == "1" then snd.healbalance = true else snd.healbalance = false end if snd.sync == true then snd.statusrecovery = true end snd.stunrecheck = false send("concentrate")
elseif multiaffliction == "right_leg_crippled" or multiaffliction == "left_leg_crippled" then snd.send("stand")
end

regexCodeList.string: ^You're not afflicted with (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Unelevate - Firstaid
Trigger.script: snd.elevatedaff[matches[2]] = nil

regexCodeList.string: ^You have unelevated (.*) back to its original priority.$

Trigger.name: Gate - Someone is using an ability
Trigger.script:
if multimatches[1][2]~="You" then snd.hitting = multimatches[1][2] if snd.who_called_affs ~= snd.hitting then snd.maybe_affs = {} end else snd.maybe_affs = {} snd.hitting = "You" end
disableTrigger("Sunder Dodge") disableTrigger("Sunder Parry") disableTrigger("Sunder Rebounding") disableTrigger("Monk Hit Tracking") snd.last_affs = {} snd.recent_affs = {} --kinda similar to last_affs but for generic miss snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 if snd.last_hit_limb and snd.last_hit_limb~="none" then snd.last_struck_limb = snd.last_hit_limb snd.last_hit_limb = "none" end snd.getting_hit = "" snd.using_both_hands = 0 snd.skill_being_used = ""
if snd.have_aff("blackout") or snd.have_aff("stun") then snd.blackoutdone = true elseif #snd.group > 0 and table.contains(snd.group, snd.hitting) then expandAlias("aa") --expandAlias("f") end

regexCodeList.string: return snd.illusionChecks.abilityGate()

Trigger.name: Basic attack
Trigger.script:
local selves = {herself = true, himself = true, itself = true, themself = true} local target = selves[matches[5]] and matches[2] or matches[5]
if snd.target == target and snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]] ~= nil then if snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]] ~= nil then snd.getting_hit = target snd.skill_being_used = matches[4] snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]](target) end end
if matches[2] == snd.target and target == "You" then snd.used.rebounding = false snd.smokedrebounding = false end

Trigger.name: Attack w/conditional
Trigger.script:
local selves = {herself = true, himself = true, itself = true, themself = true} local target = selves[matches[6]] and matches[2] or matches[6]
if snd.target == target and snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]] ~= nil then snd.getting_hit = target if matches[4] == "Shadowprice" then if snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[5]] ~= nil then snd.skill_being_used = matches[5] snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[5]](target, matches[4]) end elseif matches[4] == "Spiritpact" then if snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[5]] ~= nil then snd.skill_being_used = matches[5] snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[5]](target, matches[4]) end elseif snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]] ~= nil then snd.skill_being_used = matches[4] snd.all_class_attacks[matches[3]][matches[4]](target, matches[5]) end end
if matches[2] == snd.target and target == "You" then snd.used.rebounding = false snd.smokedrebounding = false end

Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then if snd.checkAff("besilence") then snd.target_cured("besilence") else snd.track_rebounding(snd.target) if snd.reboundingTimer then killTimer(snd.reboundingTimer) end snd.reboundingTimer = tempTimer(6.15, [[ snd.used.rebounding = true; snd.waiting_queue = false; if snd.toggles.attacking then snd.attack_function() end ]]) end snd.reboundingtrack = getEpoch() + 6.3 snd.smokedrebounding = true snd.reboundingtimerfunc() end

Just in case. end if snd.checkAff("whiplash") then snd.took_limb_dmg("head", 6.5) end
elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

regexCodeList.string: ^A tingle flows through you as the Adder on (\w+) readies itself.$
^You have already placed the Adder upon (\w+).$

Trigger.name: No adder at all
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.adder_attached = false snd.adder_ready = false end

regexCodeList.string: ^There is no Adder tarot attached to (\w+).$

Trigger.name: Adder ripped
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.adder_attached = false snd.adder_ready = false end

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) rips the Adder tarot painfully from .+ flesh.$

Trigger.name: Death aura

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) appears (\w+) from your aura of death.$
^(\w+) staggers, plagued with (\w+) as \w+ can't bear the grim melody of death from your body\.$

regexCodeList.string: ^Your swarm afflicts (\w+) with (.*).$

Trigger.name: Crush part 1
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
snd.last_limb_dmg = 2.5 snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.onHit2({"Dodge", "Parry"}) snd.crush_first_choice = snd.last_hit_limb end

regexCodeList.string: ^With careful aim \w+ smashe?s? .+ (?:mace|crozier) into (\w+)'s .+\.$

Trigger.name: Crush part 2
Trigger.script:
if snd.getting_hit == snd.target then local amount = 2.5 --buckler is 2.5 if matches[1]:find("tower") then amount = 12.5 elseif matches[1]:find("kite") then amount = 10 end snd.last_limb_dmg = amount snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.onHit2({"Dodge", "Parry"})
--We also need to add the difference to the first attack. Since you don't know what shield they're using until part 2, it's a little wonky. if amount > 2.5 then -- already good if it's buckler snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.luminary_crush_first_choice, amount-2.5) -- add the amount minus what we've already given snd.crush_first_choice = nil end end disableTrigger("Crush Confirmation")

regexCodeList.string: ^\w+ swiftly follows? up by slamming .+ into \w+ .+\.$

Trigger.name: Monk Hit Tracking
Trigger.script:
-- Only adding limb damage if we see the hit connect message. if snd.target == snd.getting_hit then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[2]
if snd.hitting == "You" and snd.stance == "cobra" or snd.stance == "tiger" then snd.last_limb_dmg = snd.last_limb_dmg * 1.2 end snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg)
if #snd.maybe_affs >= 1 then local aff = snd.maybe_affs[1] if aff ~= "" then snd.target_got(aff) table.remove(snd.maybe_affs, 1) table.insert(snd.last_affs, aff) end end
end
disableTrigger("Monk Hit Tracking")

Trigger.name: Sciomancy Repay / Maldeiction Obeisance
Trigger.script:
snd.repay = snd.repay + 1 snd.repay_timers = snd.repay_timers or {} local index = #snd.repay_timers + 1 local time = 12 if snd.have_aff("laxity") then time = time + 2 end local command = function() if snd.repay > 0 then snd.repay = snd.repay - 1 end snd.repay_timers[index] = nil snd.core() end
snd.repay_timers[index] = {timer = tempTimer(time, command), command = command}

You use Malediction Obeisance.

Trigger.name: Syncopate tracking for repay
Trigger.script: local syncopateTime = 3 for _, aff in pairs(snd.mental_affs) do if snd.have_aff(aff) then syncopateTime = syncopateTime+1 end end syncopateTime = syncopateTime + snd.hidden_afflictions if snd.repay_timers then for index, timerInfo in pairs(snd.repay_timers) do local timeRemaining = remainingTime(timerInfo.timer) killTimer(timerInfo.timer) timerInfo.timer = tempTimer(timeRemaining+syncopateTime, timerInfo.command) end end

Trigger.name: embed pull
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then local limb_table = {"right leg", "left leg", "left arm", "right arm",} for k, v in pairs(limb_table) do if matches[1]:find(v) then snd.last_hit_limb = v end end
snd.last_limb_dmg = 30
snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg ) end

Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
local aff = ""
if matches[1]:find("frenziedly") then aff = "dementia" elseif matches[1]:find("unsure") then aff = "confusion" elseif matches[1]:find("spin") then aff = "dizziness" elseif matches[1]:find("glazed") then aff = "stupidity" end
snd.target_got(aff)
end disableTrigger("Fury Shatter Second Aff")

Trigger.name: Tenacity Chop
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[3] local aff = "assault_damage_"..snd.last_hit_limb:gsub(" ","_") if snd.checkAff(aff) then snd.last_limb_dmg = 11 snd.target_cured(aff) end snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) end disableTrigger("Tenacity Chop")

Trigger.name: Tenacity Assault
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[3] snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) local aff = "assault_damage_"..snd.last_hit_limb:gsub(" ","_") snd.target_got(aff) tempTimer(2, function() snd.target_cured(aff) end) table.insert(snd.last_affs, aff) end disableTrigger("Tenacity Assault")
snd.assaultlimb = matches[3] if assaultlimb_timer then killTimer(assaultlimb_timer) end assaultlimb_timer = tempTimer(10,[[snd.assaultlimb = "none"]])

Trigger.name: Trap hit - Tracking
Trigger.script:
local aff = snd.venomtrapcoated if matches[2] == snd.target then
if aff == "larkspur" then snd.target_got("dizziness") elseif aff == "epteth" then elseif aff == "kalmia" then snd.target_got("asthma") if not snd.checkAff("left_arm_crippled") then snd.target_got("left_arm_crippled")
elseif not snd.checkAff("right_arm_crippled") then snd.target_got("right_arm_crippled") end
elseif aff == "aconite" then snd.target_got("stupidity")
elseif aff == "epseth" then if not snd.checkAff("right_leg_crippled") then snd.target_got("right_leg_crippled") elseif not snd.checkAff("left_leg_crippled") then snd.target_got("left_leg_crippled") end
elseif aff == "slike" then snd.target_got("anorexia")
elseif aff == "gecko" then snd.target_got("slickness")
elseif aff == "monkshood" then snd.target_got("disfigurement")
elseif aff == "xentio" then snd.target_got("clumsiness")
elseif aff == "euphorbia" then snd.target_got("vomiting")
elseif aff == "curare" then snd.target_got("paresis")
elseif aff == "prefarar" then if snd.checkAff("hearing") then snd.target_got("hearing") elseif not snd.checkAff("sensitivity") then snd.target_got("sensitivity") end
elseif aff == "vernalius" then snd.target_got("weariness")
elseif aff == "digitalis" then snd.target_got("shyness")
elseif aff == "darkshade" then snd.target_got("allergies")
elseif aff == "kalmia" then snd.target_got("asthma")
elseif aff == "eurypteria" then snd.target_got("recklessness")
end end snd.venomtrapcoated = "none"

Trigger.name: Kindle used - Subversion
Trigger.script:
-- second is slowburn, first is hotburn snd.splattercount = 0 snd.kindleused = true if snd.splatterone == "paralytic" then if splatterone_timer then killTimer(splatterone_timer) end splatterone_timer = tempTimer(42,[[snd.splatterone = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splatterone == "septic" then if splatterone_timer then killTimer(splatterone_timer) end splatterone_timer = tempTimer(54,[[snd.splatterone = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splatterone == "flammable" then if splatterone_timer then killTimer(splatterone_timer) end splatterone_timer = tempTimer(78,[[snd.splatterone = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splatterone == "coagulating" then if splatterone_timer then killTimer(splatterone_timer) end splatterone_timer = tempTimer(54,[[snd.splatterone = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splatterone == "hallucinatory" then if splatterone_timer then killTimer(splatterone_timer) end splatterone_timer = tempTimer(60,[[snd.splatterone = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splatterone == "adhesive" then if splatterone_timer then killTimer(splatterone_timer) end splatterone_timer = tempTimer(96,[[snd.splatterone = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splatterone == "choking" then if splatterone_timer then killTimer(splatterone_timer) end splatterone_timer = tempTimer(66,[[snd.splatterone = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) end
if snd.splattertwo == "paralytic" then if splattertwo_timer then killTimer(splattertwo_timer) end splattertwo_timer = tempTimer(36,[[snd.splattertwo = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splatterone == "septic" then if splattertwo_timer then killTimer(splattertwo_timer) end splattertwo_timer = tempTimer(48,[[snd.splattertwo = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splattertwo == "flammable" then if splattertwo_timer then killTimer(splattertwo_timer) end splattertwo_timer = tempTimer(72,[[snd.splattertwo = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splattertwo == "coagulating" then if splattertwo_timer then killTimer(splattertwo_timer) end splattertwo_timer = tempTimer(48,[[snd.splattertwo = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splattertwo == "hallucinatory" then if splattertwo_timer then killTimer(splattertwo_timer) end splattertwo_timer = tempTimer(54,[[snd.splattertwo = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splattertwo == "adhesive" then if splattertwo_timer then killTimer(splattertwo_timer) end splattertwo_timer = tempTimer(90,[[snd.splattertwo = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) elseif snd.splattertwo == "choking" then if splattertwo_timer then killTimer(splattertwo_timer) end splattertwo_timer = tempTimer(60,[[snd.splattertwo = "none" snd.splattercount = 0]]) end
snd.staone()

Trigger.name: poultice
Trigger.script: if matches[2]:lower() == snd.target:lower() then snd.target_cured("slickness") snd.target_cured("slough") snd.immediateResto() if snd.sloughTimer then killTimer(snd.sloughTimer) end if not snd.checkAff("burnt_skin") then if matches[4] == "epidermal" then snd.target_last_used_salve = "epidermal" if matches[5] == "head" then if snd.checksomeAffs({"stuttering","blurry_vision","indifference","burnt_eyes","sight"}, 1) then snd.target_used("epidermal_head") else snd.target_got("sight") end elseif matches[5] == "torso" then snd.target_used("epidermal_torso") elseif matches[5] == "skin" then snd.target_used("epidermal") end else snd.target_used(matches[4]) end end if (snd.class == "Zealot" or snd.class == "Ravager") and matches[2] == snd.target and snd.flamestack > 0 then cecho("\n"..snd.target.." Now has <light_goldenrod>"..snd.flamestack.."<dodger_blue> stacks of intensity") end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

Trigger.name: Soothing

": soothing " .. matches[3]) end if snd.checkAff("whiplash") and matches[4] == "head" then snd.target_cured("whiplash") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "whiplash") elseif snd.checkAff("backstrain") and matches[4] == "torso" then snd.target_cured("backstrain") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "backstrain") elseif snd.checkAff("muscle_spasms") and matches[4] == "torso" then snd.target_cured("muscle_spasms") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "muscle_spasms") elseif snd.checkAff("stiffness") and matches[4] == "torso" then snd.target_cured("stiffness") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "muscle_spasms") elseif snd.checkAff("sore_wrist") and (matches[4]:find("arm") or matches[4]:find("arms")) then snd.target_cured("sore_wrist") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "sore_wrist") elseif snd.checkAff("weak_grip") and (matches[4]:find("arm") or matches[4]:find("arms")) then snd.target_cured("weak_grip") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "weak_grip") elseif snd.checkAff("sore_ankle") and (matches[4]:find("leg") or matches[4]:find("legs")) then snd.target_cured("sore_ankle") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "sore_ankle") else if snd.checkAff("whiplash") then snd.target_cured("whiplash") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "whiplash") elseif snd.checkAff("backstrain") then snd.target_cured("backstrain") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "backstrain") elseif snd.checkAff("muscle_spasms") then snd.target_cured("muscle_spasms") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "muscle_spasms") elseif snd.checkAff("stiffness") then snd.target_cured("stiffness") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "stiffness") elseif snd.checkAff("sore_wrist") then snd.target_cured("sore_wrist") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "sore_wrist") elseif snd.checkAff("weak_grip") then snd.target_cured("weak_grip") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "weak_grip") elseif snd.checkAff("sore_ankle") then snd.target_cured("sore_ankle") table.insert(snd.last_affs, "sore_ankle") end end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.gui.enabled then deleteFull() end

Trigger.name: undo in general
Trigger.script: local coldAffs = {"shivering", "frigid", "frozen"} if snd.target == matches[2] then if matches[1]:find("venom") then snd.target_cured(snd.venomEffect(matches[3])) else if table.contains(coldAffs, matches[3]) then snd.target_cured("cold") else snd.target_cured(matches[3]) end end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

regexCodeList.string: ^You discern that (\w+) has resisted the (.+) affliction\.$
^(\w+)'s? galeward protects .+ from the (\w+) venom\.$
^(\w+)'s? waterward protects .+ from the (\w+) venom\.$

Trigger.name: Sunder Parry
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.removeProneStates(true) if #snd.last_affs >= 1 then if snd.last_affs[1] == "blaze" or snd.last_affs[1] == "wasi" then snd.used.rebounding = true else for i in pairs(snd.last_affs) do snd.target_cured(snd.last_affs[i]) end end end
snd.templar_last_limb = snd.last_hit_limb
if snd.last_hit_limb ~= "none" and snd.bruisingHit then snd.limb_bruising[snd.last_hit_limb] = math.max(0, snd.limb_bruising[snd.last_hit_limb]-1) end
if snd.last_hit_limb ~= "none" and snd.last_limb_dmg ~= 0 then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, -snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.last_hit_limb = "none" snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 end
if snd.checkAff("sore_wrist") then snd.took_limb_dmg("left arm", 4) snd.took_limb_dmg("right arm", 4) end
if snd.using_both_hands == 1 then table.insert(snd.maybe_affs, 1, snd.last_affs[1]) end
snd.last_affs = {} snd.luminary_crush_first_choice = nil
end
disableTrigger("Sunder Parry")

regexCodeList.string: ^(\w+) parries the attack on .* with a deft maneuver\.$
^(\w+) guards the attack on .*\.$
^(\w+) steps into the attack on .*, grabs .+ arm and twists it\.$
^With a free hand, (\w+) fends off the attack on \w+ .+\.$
^With a predatory growl, (\w+) opposes the attack on [a-z ]+, denying it purchase\.$
^Foreseeing the baited attack on .+, (\w+)'s hook streaks out, denying the strike.$
^(\w+) parries the attack to \w+ .+, pushing \w+ back\.$
^(.*) steps into the attack on (the )?\w+ (.*), grabs your arm, and shakes you violently\.$

Trigger.name: Sunder Dodge
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then
if snd.skill_being_used == "Twinshot" then table.remove(snd.maybe_affs, 1) return end if snd.skill_being_used == "Overhand" or snd.skill_being_used == "Breach" then snd.lev_gone = false end if #snd.last_affs >= 1 then if snd.last_affs[1] == "blaze" or snd.last_affs[1] == "wasi" then snd.used.rebounding = true else for i in pairs(snd.last_affs) do snd.target_cured(snd.last_affs[i]) end end end if snd.last_hit_limb ~= "none" and snd.bruisingHit then snd.limb_bruising[snd.last_hit_limb] = math.max(0, snd.limb_bruising[snd.last_hit_limb]-1) end if snd.last_hit_limb ~= "none" and snd.last_limb_dmg ~= 0 then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, -snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.last_hit_limb = "none" snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 end
if snd.using_both_hands == 1 then table.insert(snd.maybe_affs, 1, snd.last_affs[1]) end
snd.last_affs = {} snd.luminary_crush_first_choice = nil
end
disableTrigger("Sunder Dodge")

Trigger.name: Sunder Rebounding
Trigger.script:
if #snd.last_affs >= 1 then for i in pairs(snd.last_affs) do snd.target_cured(snd.last_affs[i]) end end
if snd.last_hit_limb ~= "none" and snd.bruisingHit then snd.limb_bruising[snd.last_hit_limb] = math.max(0, snd.limb_bruising[snd.last_hit_limb]-1) end
if snd.last_hit_limb ~= "none" and snd.last_limb_dmg ~= 0 then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, -snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.last_hit_limb = "none" snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 end
if snd.using_both_hands == 1 then table.insert(snd.maybe_affs, 1, snd.last_affs[1]) end
snd.last_affs = {} snd.used.rebounding = true snd.getting_hit = "You"
disableTrigger("Sunder Rebounding")

Trigger.name: Generic Miss
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.hitting and snd.getting_hit == snd.target then
if #snd.last_affs >= 1 then if snd.last_affs[1] == "blaze" or snd.last_affs[1] == "wasi" then snd.used.rebounding = true else for i in pairs(snd.last_affs) do snd.target_cured(snd.last_affs[i]) end end else for _, aff in pairs(snd.recent_affs) do snd.target_cured(aff) end snd.recent_affs = {} end
if snd.last_hit_limb ~= "none" and snd.last_limb_dmg ~= 0 then snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, -snd.last_limb_dmg) snd.last_hit_limb = "none" snd.last_limb_dmg = 0 end
if snd.skill_being_used == "Overhand" or snd.skill_being_used == "Breach" then snd.lev_gone = false end
if snd.using_both_hands == 1 then table.insert(snd.maybe_affs, 1, snd.last_affs[1]) end
end

Trigger.name: mangled
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.target_cured("ravaged")
snd.message("<red>"..matches[2].."'s <white>"..matches[3].." was mangled!") if matches[2] == snd.target then snd.last_hit_limb = matches[3] if snd.limb_dmg[matches[3]]<66.66 then snd.last_limb_dmg = 66.66-snd.limb_dmg[matches[3]] if snd.checkAff("armor_tattoo") then snd.last_limb_dmg = snd.last_limb_dmg*2 --make sure this doesn't do wonky end snd.took_limb_dmg(snd.last_hit_limb, snd.last_limb_dmg) end snd.limb_status[matches[3]] = "mangled" snd.target_got(matches[3].." mangled") end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

Trigger.name: Survival restore
Trigger.script: if matches[2] == snd.target then if snd.checkAff("right_arm_crippled") and not snd.checkAff("right_arm_crippled") then snd.target_cured("right_arm_crippled") elseif snd.checkAff("left_arm_crippled") and not snd.checkAff("left_arm_crippled") then snd.target_cured("left_arm_crippled") elseif snd.checkAff("left_leg_crippled") and not snd.checkAff("left_leg_crippled") then snd.target_cured("left_leg_crippled") elseif snd.checkAff("right_leg_crippled") and not snd.checkAff("ight_leg_crippled") then snd.target_cured("right_leg_crippled") end end

Trigger.name: bruising
Trigger.script:
if matches[3] == snd.target then local bruise = matches[2] local limb = matches[4]
if bruise == "light" then snd.limb_bruising[limb] = 1 elseif bruise == "moderate" then snd.limb_bruising[limb] = 2 elseif bruise == "critical" then snd.limb_bruising[limb] = 3 end elseif snd.toggles.nontargetgags and snd.toggles.gags then deleteFull() end

Trigger.name: Deliverance in room
Trigger.script: selectCurrentLine() local line = getSelection() local sections = string.split(line, "is surrounded by a glowing white nimbus.") table.remove(sections) --pop off the last split line local deliveringPeople = {} for _, section in pairs(sections) do local person = "" for name in string.gmatch(section, "(%a+) is here%.") do person = name end table.insert(deliveringPeople, person) end for _, person in pairs(deliveringPeople) do cecho("\n<red>"..person.." is using DELIVERANCE!") end if person == snd.target then string = string.."wt STOP HITTING STOP HITTING STOP!" snd.target = "nil" snd.stap() end snd.send(string)

regexCodeList.string: is surrounded by a glowing white nimbus.

Trigger.name: got hit
Trigger.script:
local exclusions = {"Destruction", "Weaponry", "Relic", "Raloth", "Artifact", "Survival", "Research", "Manipulation", "Tattoos"} local skill = multimatches[2][3]
if not table.contains(exclusions, skill) then found_set = "none" for set in pairs(snd.cureset_skills) do if table.contains(snd.cureset_skills[set], skill) then found_set = set end end
if snd.class_hitting == "none" then --haven't seen anyone hit yet snd.class_hitting = found_set --note what class is hitting
if found_set == "none" then --skill isn't in class list echo("\nNo curing set.") elseif snd.cureset ~= found_set then snd.cureset = found_set echo("\nCuring set to: "..snd.cureset) if found_set == "archivist" or found_set == "voideer" then snd.firstaidassArchivist() elseif found_set == "bard" then snd.firstaidassBard() snd.send("qeb dodge upset") elseif found_set == "indorani" or found_set == "oneiromancer" then snd.firstaidassIndorani() snd.send("qeb dodge upset") elseif found_set == "luminary" or found_set == "earthcaller" then snd.firstaidassLuminary() elseif found_set == "zealot" or found_set == "ravager" then snd.firstaidassZealot() elseif found_set == "sentinel" or found_set == "executor" then snd.firstaidassSentinel() elseif found_set == "ascendril" or found_set == "bloodborn" then snd.firstaidassAscendril() elseif found_set == "teradrim" or found_set == "tidesage" then snd.firstaidassTeradrim() if snd.class == "Ravager" then snd.send("qeb bait left leg") end elseif found_set == "shapeshifter" then snd.firstaidassShapeshifter() if snd.class == "Ravager" then snd.send("qeb bait left leg") end elseif found_set == "carnifex" or found_set == "warden" then snd.firstaidassCarnifex() elseif found_set == "templar" or found_set == "revenant" then snd.firstaidassTemplar() elseif found_set == "praenomen" or found_set == "akkari" then snd.firstaidassPraenomen() elseif found_set == "predator" then snd.firstaidassPredator() if snd.class == "Ravager" then snd.send("qeb bait left leg") end elseif found_set == "sciomancer" or found_set == "runecarver" then snd.firstaidassSciomancer() elseif found_set == "shaman" or found_set == "alchemist" then snd.firstaidassShaman() elseif found_set == "wayfarer" then snd.firstaidassWayfarer() elseif found_set == "infiltrator" then snd.firstaidassInfiltrator() elseif found_set == "monk" then snd.firstaidassMonk() if snd.class == "Ravager" then snd.send("qeb bait left leg") end end end snd.person_hitting = multimatches[2][2] end end
if not table.contains(snd.people_hitting_me, multimatches[2][2]) then table.insert(snd.people_hitting_me, multimatches[2][2]) tempTimer(20, [[table.remove(snd.people_hitting_me, 1)]]) end

Trigger.script: if sndNDB.players[gmcp.Char.Status.name].city == sndNDB.players[matches[2]].city then else snd.send("wt "..matches[2].." is singing Oblivion next to v"..gmcp.Room.Info.num) if snd.class == "Infiltrator" then expandAlias("gs "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Shaman" or snd.class == "Alchemist" then expandAlias("np "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Luminary" then snd.attack("qeb angel beckon "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Earthcaller" then snd.attack("qeb osso lurch "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Praenomen" then snd.attack("qeb lure "..matches[2]) elseif snd.class == "Akkari" then snd.attack("qeb DEJEMASHAI "..matches[2]) end -- onei bowl dreamscape? throatcrush range? wayfarer axe toss? end

Trigger.name: Warning - Collapse / Omophagia
Trigger.script:

Trigger.name: secondary mirror bomb start thing
Trigger.script: if string.sub(matches[2],1,1) then enableTrigger("mirror bomb triggers") end

Trigger.name: Grab everything
Trigger.script:
local endCharacters = {'"', '.', '!', '?', ']'}
local bracketSwaps = { [')']='(', ['(']=')', ['[']=']', [']']='[', ['{']='}', ['}']='{', }
mirrorLine = mirrorLine or "" lastLine = lastLine or ""
local function feedStuff() disableTrigger("mirror bomb triggers") lastLine = mirrorLine feedTriggers(mirrorLine.."\n") mirrorLine = "" enableTrigger("mirror bomb triggers") end
local line = matches[2]
if #line~=80 then --no longer in mirror mode disableTrigger("mirror bomb triggers") cecho("<red> MIRROR MODE OFF!") return end
line = string.gsub(line, "^ +", "") local newLine = "" for i=#line,0, -1 do local char = string.sub(line,i,i) newLine = newLine..(bracketSwaps[char] or char) end if newLine == lastLine then return end
deleteLine()
if isPrompt() and #mirrorLine>0 then feedStuff() end if #mirrorLine>0 then mirrorLine = mirrorLine.." " end mirrorLine = mirrorLine..newLine
if table.contains(endCharacters, string.sub(mirrorLine, #mirrorLine,#mirrorLine)) then feedStuff() return end

Trigger.name: death prompt
Trigger.script:
setTriggerStayOpen("Death In Room", 0)
if snd.toggles.calling and not snd.targeting.burst then if table.contains(snd.players_here, snd.targeting.who) then table.remove(snd.players_here, table.index_of(snd.players_here, snd.targeting.who)) end if snd.targeting.who == snd.target then snd.get_new_target() end end
snd.targeting.who = nil snd.targeting.burst = false

Trigger.name: Target no longer available
Trigger.script:
if not snd.channeling then if snd.toggles.bashing then snd.no_target() end if not snd.flying then snd.target_gone = true end
if not snd.toggles.calling then return end
local who = matches[2]:title()
if table.contains(snd.players_here, who) then table.remove(snd.players_here, table.index_of(snd.players_here, who)) send("ql") end
if who:lower() ~= "eld" and who == snd.target:title() then snd.no_target() snd.loyalsattacking = false end end

regexCodeList.string: ^You can find no such target as '(\w+)'\.$
^You can find no such target as \'(\w+)\'\.$

Trigger.name: Target list
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.talker then return end
local caller = matches[2] local list = matches[3]
if table.contains(snd.callers, matches[2]) then snd.addTargetList(list) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target list\: (.+)\."$

Trigger.name: Target Priority
Trigger.script:
if matches[2] ~= gmcp.Comm.Channel.Text.talker then return end
local caller = matches[2] local tar = matches[3] local pos = matches[4] or nil
if table.contains(snd.callers, matches[2]) then snd.addSingleTarget(tar, pos) end

regexCodeList.string: ^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target priority\: (\w+) (\d+)\."$
^\(Web\)\: (\w+) says, "Target priority\: (\w+)\."$

if table.contains(snd.targeting.list, who) then snd.get_new_target() end
